sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductServiceService } from '../product-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-bar', templateUrl: './nav-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-bar.component.css'] }) export class NavBarComponent { constructor(private _service:ProductServiceService){} ProductName:string =""; search() { this._service.searchInput = this.ProductName; //use the nest of the bahavior to notifies the subscriber this._service.searchBarTouchedSubject.next(this.ProductName); } }
